text: The men's 400 metres hurdles event at the 1994 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Lisbon, Portugal, at Estádio Universitário de Lisboa on 20, 21 and 22 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Gennadiy Gorbenko ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Miklós Roth ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Noel Levy ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 22 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
